Family Fun Registration

Instructions:

To submit your picks, please enter your entry nickname, password, name, e-mail address, and phone number and click submit. If successful, "Insert Good" will display and your entry nickname will appear in the Registered Participants column to the right (you may need to scroll down to find your nickname).

After creating your entry nickname(s), enter your password and click on "Your Picks" next to your entry nickname(s) in the Registered Participants table to the right.

If you have any troubles or questions email Family Fun Coordinator.
